00098             function                get_button_template( $MacroParameters )
00099             {
00100                   try
00101                   {
00102                         switch( $MacroParameters->get_setting( 'type' , '' ) )
00103                         {
00104                               case( 'href' ):$FileName = 'href_history_button.tpl';break;
00105                               
00106                               default:$FileName = 'image_history_button_48.tpl';break;
00107                         }
00108                         
00109                         return( $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , $FileName ) );
00110                   }
00111                   catch( Exception $e )
00112                   {
00113                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00114                   }

00143             function                process_history_button( $Str , $Changed )
00144             {
00145                   try
00146                   {
00147                         $Rules = array( 'object_type' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'id' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00148                         
00149                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'history_button' , $Rules ) ; )
00150                         {
00151                               $this->MacroParameters->load_settings( $Parameters );
00152 
00153                               $id = $this->MacroParameters->get_setting( 'id' );
00154                               $ObjectType = $this->MacroParameters->get_setting( 'object_type' );
00155                               
00156                               $Button = $this->get_button_template( $this->MacroParameters );
00157 
00158                               $Code = $this->ChangeHistoryView->get_changes_grid( $id , $ObjectType );
00159                               $Code = $Button.$Code;
00160                               
00161                               $Code = str_replace( '{id}' , $id , $Code );
00162                               
00163                               $Str = str_replace( "{history_button:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );
00164                               $Changed = true;
00165                         }
00166                         
00167                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00168                   }
00169                   catch( Exception $e )
00170                   {
00171                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00172                   }
00173             }
00174             
00205             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00206             {
00207                   try
00208                   {     
00209                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_history_button( $Str , $Changed );
00210 
00211                         return( $Str );
00212                   }
00213                   catch( Exception $e )
00214                   {
00215                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
